entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind north 40 km/h diminishing to 20 this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
